definition: to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)

sentences.english: Below, you can see the result with each Anti-aliased method.
sentences.chinese: 下面，你可以看到每个反走样方法的结果。

sentences.english: I can assure you it wears well and keeps its shape.
sentences.chinese: 我可以向你保证这个耐穿且不走样。

sentences.english: Keep your shoes from losing shape.
Anti-aliasing is the application of signal processing in rasterization.
sentences.chinese: 反走样技术是信号处理在光栅化过程中的应用。

sentences.english: It can take the best idea and twist it into worst of shapes.
sentences.chinese: 它可以吸收最好的想法，然后将它最走样的执行。

sentences.english: He felt that replicas and fake products in the production process will lose shape.
sentences.chinese: 他觉得，复制品和仿制品在制作过程中是会走样的。

sentences.english: If human nature were good, would we keep this up for thousands of years ?
sentences.chinese: 如果人性本善，我们能将这份淳朴流传千年而不走样？

sentences.english: A piecewise-linear approximation is used for antialiased arcs and thick arcs.
sentences.chinese: 反走样弧线和粗弧线使用线性分段近似来实现。

sentences.english: The Anti-aliased Method used here is None.
sentences.chinese: 反走样方法用在这里是无。

sentences.english: And the data already cleansed start getting stale.
sentences.chinese: 已经清理过的数据又开始走样了。

definition: out of shape/to lose shape/to deform
to put on weight/to get fat (a sign of prosperity, so a compliment)
to put on weight/to get fat
to lose weight (intentionally)/to slim down/(Tw) to downsize (a business)
obese/bloated/swollen (style)/(fig.) (of an organization) oversized or overstaffed
elderly, as in movement or bearing
